staxel.village.dialogue.job.FishingSpotM: There are no good ^c:1486b0;fishing spots^c:pop; around here...
I'm starting to get really hungry mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
I need you to build a ^c:1486b0;fishing spot^c:pop;...
If you don't I might cry mya...
You don't want that do you?
Use this ^c:d03e37;signpost^c:pop; to designate the area for it.
You can build the pier on a pond or the ocean.
It doesn't really matter... just let me fish mya!
You'll need these blueprints to make some of the parts mya.
There's three main items you'll need.
You can probably find a ^c:d03e37;barrel^c:pop; lying around the farm somewhere.
Or you could always buy a ^c:d03e37;blueprint^c:pop; from the ^c:1486b0;building store^c:pop; and make it yourself!
Making the ^c:d03e37;fish rack^c:pop; will probably be pretty easy mya!
The ^c:1486b0;building store^c:pop; has everything you need for that!
I suspect the hard part will be the ^c:d03e37;baitbox^c:pop; mya.
It's the most important part though mya!
I think you might need to buy the ^c:d03e37;combining station^c:pop; from the ^c:1486b0;grocery store^c:pop;.
The ^c:1486b0;building store^c:pop; should sell ^c:d03e37;carving stations^c:pop; though mya!
You'll also need to find a ^c:d03e37;bug net^c:pop; in one of the stores and catch some bugs!
Don't worry if you forget all the parts you need though mya!
Once you put down the ^c:d03e37;sign^c:pop;, you can look at it to see what's missing!
I'm pawsitive you'll get it just right mya!
Oh no, did the ^c:d03e37;fishing spot signpost^c:pop; go missing mya?
I can make you a new one, but it'll cost {0-currency}{1-sign}...
Yes please!
Maybe later.
Okay, mya! Let me know if you change your mind!
I think you'll need a few more petals than that mya...
It's not going anywhere though!
This took me a lot of work to make so please don't lose it again, mya!
